meanings.definition: To engage in reconnaissance or scouting.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were recceing the area for potential threats.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys recceing new hiking trails before bringing her friends along.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat was recceing the backyard for any signs of intruders.
meanings.sent4: His sharp eyes were like recceing cameras, capturing every detail around him.
meanings.sent5: Recceing the market for the best deals felt like a treasure hunt.

meanings.definition: The act of conducting a reconnaissance mission.
meanings.sent1: The recceing of the enemy's positions was crucial for the success of the mission.
meanings.sent2: She volunteered for the recceing of the new territory to gather valuable information.
meanings.sent3: The recceing of the dessert table at the party was a strategic move by the kids.
meanings.sent4: The recceing of the old library felt like stepping into a forgotten world.
meanings.sent5: His passion for recceing made him the go-to person for exploration trips.
